module.title: Manage: User: Provision
module.description: Management for user-ordered provisioning of products, licenses and their keys.
module.log: Add ranking for products and licenses.
Add job to handle expired keys.
Add controller, view and templates for products.
module.author: Christian Würker
module.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>user_provision_licenses`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>user_provision_licenses` ( `userLicenseId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `productLicenseId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `productId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `uid` varchar(6) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `duration` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `users` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL, `price` decimal(6,2) unsigned NOT NULL, `currency` varchar(3) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `startsAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `endsAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`userLicenseId`), KEY `userId` (`userId`), KEY `licenseId` (`productLicenseId`), KEY `status` (`status`), KEY `uid` (`uid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>user_provision_license_keys`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>user_provision_license_keys` ( `userLicenseKeyId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userLicenseId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `userId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `productLicenseId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `productId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `uid` varchar(13) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned NOT NULL, `startsAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `endsAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`userLicenseKeyId`), KEY `userLicenseId` (`userLicenseId`), KEY `userId` (`userId`), KEY `productLicenseId` (`productLicenseId`), KEY `productId` (`productId`), KEY `status` (`status`), KEY `startsAt` (`startsAt`), KEY `endsAt` (`endsAt`), KEY `uid` (`uid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>user_provision_licenses`; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>user_provision_license_keys`;
